Question: Matias CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Matias

Product: Matias CES 2024 Wireless USB-C Keyboards and Mice

- Debuted world's smallest wireless USB-C receiver for keyboards and mice
- Offers wireless USB-C keyboard and mouse options at prices ranging from $29 to $79
- Keyboard available in Black for PC, Silver for Mac, priced at $49
- Wireless Aluminum Keyboard available in Black for PC, Silver and Space Gray for Mac, priced at $79
- Wireless USB-C Mouse and Wireless USB-C Pro Mouse available in Black and White, priced at $29 and $79 respectively
- Popular brand in the Mac and mechanical keyboard communities
- Has manufacturing facilities in Asia and serves corporate, industrial, education, and government customers worldwide
Summary_cn:
Matias

产品：Matias CES 2024 无线 USB-C 键盘和鼠标

- 首次推出世界上最小的无线 USB-C 键盘和鼠标接收器
- 提供价格从 29 到 79 美元的无线 USB-C 键盘和鼠标选项
- 键盘提供黑色 PC 版和银色 Mac 版，售价为 49 美元
- 无线铝制键盘提供黑色 PC 版和银色、太空灰色 Mac 版，售价为 79 美元
- 无线 USB-C 鼠标和无线 USB-C Pro 鼠标提供黑色和白色，售价分别为 29 美元和 79 美元
- 在 Mac 和机械键盘社群中颇受欢迎的品牌
- 在亚洲有生产设施，并为全球的企业、工业、教育和政府客户提供服务
